title: Ad Revenue Earned
description: Fired when ad revenue is recorded for a served ad impression.

revenue.description: The revenue amount earned from the ad.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the revenue (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

adType.description: The format or type of the ad unit.

adNetwork.description: The ad network or provider serving the ad.

placement.description: The placement location or slot where the ad was displayed.
